content: embrace the elegance of the snow drops reversible cowl a crochet pattern designed for all skill levels this versatile cowl features a delicate lace pattern that adds a touch of sophistication to any outfit the cowl measures 7 5 wide x 17 long when laid flat with a circumference of 34 this cowl is soft warm versatile and easy to care for the pattern includes detailed instructions and a chart making it perfect for beginners and experienced crocheters alike **unique features-** reversible design for versatile styling easy-to-follow written pattern and chart beautiful lace and textured stitches for a sophisticated look seamless construction for a polished finish **materials needed-** hook us-i 5 5 mm hook - **furls** https //tidd ly/4l6y8yy yarn **lb collection superwash merino** https //lionbrand sjv io/0930em dk weight 500 yards
